name: Project BOLA
description:
Project BOLA is a Bullet-hell Roguelike game where you fight waves and waves of enemies and try to get as far as you can.

You can collect coins to purchase upgrades at the end of every wave, improving your character's attributes and making it easier to fight the enemies.

At the moment, the game contains:

  • 2 Weapons you can use;
  • 1 Ability to move faster;
  • 6 Different types of enemies;
  • 20 Upgrades with different rarities;
  • 1 Bad-looking menu.

In future updates, I intend to add:

  • Different weapons with different effects;
  • Tons of abilities to adapt to everyone's playstyle;
  • A lot of enemies;
  • Bosses and Mini-bosses every few waves;
  • Cool sound effects.
